short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Opens all new tabs in the foreground

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: By default Chrome loads links you've middle clicked on in the background. When active, this extension will bring that tab to the foreground for you. You can toggle this behaviour on and off by simply clicking the extensions icon in the Chrome toolbar.
